text: Sligo University Hospital () is an acute general hospital in Sligo, Ireland. It is managed by Saolta University Health Care Group. ==History== The hospital has its origins in the Sligo County Hospital which was built in the Mall in Sligo and opened in 1940. A major extension to the hospital was officially opened by Erskine Childers, Tanaiste in March 1971. The hospital changed its name from Sligo General Hospital to Sligo University Hospital in November 2015. ==References== ==External links== *Official Website *Emergency Department, SRH *Research and Education Centre Library Category:Sligo (town) Category:Health Service Executive hospitals Category:1940 establishments in Ireland Category:Hospitals established in 1940 Category:Hospital buildings completed in 1940 Category:Hospitals in County Sligo
title: Sligo University Hospital
